sentences.sentence: You can try dancing the hula and taking part in an authentic luau (feast).
sentences.translation: 你可以跳草裙舞，参加真正的夏威夷宴会。

sentences.sentence: Later a Hawaiian I met on my first night in Honolulu invites me to a luau.
sentences.translation: 之后，我到达檀香山当晚所认识的一个夏威夷人邀请我参加烤猪野宴。

sentences.sentence: Later, a Hawaiian I met on my first night in Honolulu invites me to a luau.
sentences.translation: 之后，我到达檀香山当晚所认识的一个夏威夷人邀请我参加烤猪野宴。
